SELECT COUNT(0) AS TOTAL FROM TBLIV_BAT_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLIV_BAT_WRK_MAP B on A.BAT_GRP_ID = B.BAT_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLIV_BAT_PGM C on B.BAT_PGM_ID = C.BAT_PGM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLIV_BAT_PGM_LOG D on A.BAT_GRP_ID = D.BAT_GRP_ID AND B.BAT_PGM_ID = D.BAT_PGM_ID AND D.SO_ID = #{soId} AND D.BS_YYMM = #{bsYymm} LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME E ON E.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00033' AND E.LNG_TYP = #{lang} AND D.BAT_PROC_STAT = E.COMMON_CD
WHERE A.BAT_GRP_ID = #{batGrpId}

/*com.ntels.ccbs.charge.mapper.charge.charge.ChargeCalculationMapper.getRegularChargeJobList*/ SELECT A.BAT_GRP_ID ,B.BAT_PGM_ID ,C.PGM_NM ,B.WRK_PROC_ORD ,D.BAT_PROC_STAT ,E.CODE_NM AS BAT_PROC_STAT_NM ,D.LOG_FILE_PTH ,D.LOG_FILE_NM ,D.READ_CNT ,D.CMPL_CNT ,D.PGM_STRT_DTTM ,D.PGM_END_DTTM
,TIMEDIFF ( STR_TO_DATE (D.PGM_END_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') , STR_TO_DATE (D.PGM_STRT_DTTM, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') ) AS START_END_TIME
,TO_CHAR (TO_DATE (TRUNC ( MOD( TO_DATE (D.PGM_END_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') - TO_DATE (D.PGM_STRT_DTTM, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') , 1) * 24 * 60 * 60), 'sssss'), 'hh24:mi:ss') AS START_END_TIME
,D.BS_YYMM ,D.PGM_EXE_SEQ_NO ,C.PKG_NM ,C.EXEC_OBJ FROM TBLIV_BAT_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLIV_BAT_WRK_MAP B on A.BAT_GRP_ID = B.BAT_GRP_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLIV_BAT_PGM C on B.BAT_PGM_ID = C.BAT_PGM_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TBLIV_BAT_PGM_LOG D on A.BAT_GRP_ID = D.BAT_GRP_ID AND B.BAT_PGM_ID = D.BAT_PGM_ID AND D.SO_ID = #{soId} AND D.BS_YYMM = #{bsYymm} LEFT OUTER JOIN TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME E ON E.COMMON_GRP = 'BL00033' AND E.LNG_TYP = #{lang} AND D.BAT_PROC_STAT = E.COMMON_CD WHERE A.BAT_GRP_ID = #{batGrpId} ORDER BY B.WRK_PROC_ORD
